tr.td: Human in-vivo diffusion MRI data and myelin maps
Anonymised raw data is openly available for download via OpenNeuro. Accession code: ds002634 (version 1.0.1), project_larynx(https://openneuro.org/datasets/ds002634)
Available from the National Chimpanzee Brain Resource (http://www.chimpanzeebrain.org/). Data from the following subjects were used: Bo, Cheetah, Lulu, Wenka, Foxy.
Raw data available from the National Chimpanzee Brain Resource (http://www.chimpanzeebrain.org/). Data from all 29 subjects were used.
Macaque ex-vivo diffusion MRI data (4 macaques)
Source data available from the PRIMatE Data Exchange (PRIME-DE) resource (http://fcon_1000.projects.nitrc.org/indi/indiPRIME.html4).Dataset: University of Oxford WIN Macaque PM
Data of four monkeys freely available at: https://gin.g-node.org/hbridge_oxford/brainwithoutv1. Data of the fifth monkey available upon request.
